name: Hype: The Time Quest
description:
Hype: The Time Quest is an action, adventure and RPG game developed by Ubisoft Montreal, Ubi Soft Entertainment and Playmobil. It was originally released in 1999. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Hype: The Time Quest is available on PlayStation 2, Game Boy Color and PC.
Benoit Galarneau directed the game.
